name: uwutf8
description: A well-tested UTF-8 encoder/decoder written in JavaScript.

scripts.build: cd tests; if [ ! -f data.json ]; then python generate-test-data.py; fi
scripts.cover-html: istanbul cover --report html --verbose --dir coverage tests/tests.js; istanbul report --root coverage --format html
scripts.cover-coveralls: istanbul cover --verbose --dir coverage tests/tests.js && coveralls < coverage/lcov.info; rm -rf coverage/lcov*
